type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be NetworkConnection

linkFrom.description: Relationship. ServiceComponent which needs to establish a network connection with the 'linkTo' component.

linkTo.description: Relationship. ServiceComponent which exposes some network ports that need to be used by the 'linkFrom' component.

networkPorts.description: Relationship. NetworkPorts exposed by the 'linkTo' component and used by the 'linkFrom' component.

items.description: Relationship. NetworkPort exposed by the 'linkTo' component and used by the 'linkFrom' component.

status.description: Property. Enum:'Up', 'Down'. Status of the connection.
